string.text: Find the Wish Granter
The Wish Granter is rumored to be buried deep within Chernobyl NPP. You must find it.
Meet with Sidorovich
Sidorovich in Cordon is known to give assistance to new stalkers in the Zone.
Meet Colonel Petrenko
Report to Colonel Petrenko to receive your mission.
Meet Lukash
Freedom leader Lukash wants to meet with you.
Meet Cold
Meet with Cold in the Clear Sky base.
Meet Professor Sakharov
Professor Sakharov has an assignment for you.
Meet Dushman
Talk to Dushman.
Meet Major Kuznetsov
Report to Major Kuznetsov.
Meet Sultan
Sultan wants to meet with you.
Meet Rabbit
Seek guidance from the wise Rabbit.
Meet with Sidorovich
Sidorovich in Cordon is your next destination.
Meet with Xenotech
Xenotech in Cordon is your next destination.
Meet with Beard
Beard aboard the Skadovsk is your next destination.
Meet with Noah
Noah in Zaton is your next destination.
Meet with Colonel Petrenko
Colonel Petrenko in Rostok is your next destination.
Meet with Mangun
Mangun in Rostok is your next destination.
Meet with Lukash
Lukash in the Military Warehouses is your next destination.
Meet with Loki
Loki in Yanov Station is your next destination.
Meet with Cold
Cold in the Great Swamp is your next destination.
Meet with Librarian
Librarian in the Great Swamp is your next destination.
Meet with Professor Sakharov
Professor Sakharov in Yantar is your next destination.
Meet with Tukarev
Tukarev in Jupiter is your next destination.
Meet with Dushman
Dushman in Dead City is your next destination.
Meet with Hog
Hog in Dead City is your next destination.
Meet with Major Kuznetsov
Major Kuznetsov in Agoroprom is your next destination.
Meet with Lieutenant Kirilov
Lieutenant Kirilov in Agoroprom is your next destination.
Meet with Sultan
Sultan in Dark Valley is your next destination.
Meet with Olivius
Olivius in Dark Valley is your next destination.
Meet with Rabbit
Rabbit in Pripyat is your next destination.
Meet with Cleric
Cleric in Pripyat is your next destination.
Procure %s for Clear Sky
A guy from Clear Sky asked me to bring him %s.
I'm running low on supplies. If you happen to have any on-hand or are willing to bring me some, I would be very grateful.
I'm low on %s. Have some on you? Come find me if you get your hands on any.
Great man, thanks!
Find %s for Freedom member
I was asked to find %s, by a Freedomer.
Shit, man. Can you do me a huge favour? I'm running low on my supplies. Can you help me out?
I'm low on %s. Have some on you? Come find me if you get your hands on any.
Awesome, man. Thanks!
%s Stew
A guy from Clear Sky has a special recipe for preparing mutant meat and needs %s brought to him.
Man, you ever tried mutant meat? A lot of guys won't touch it unless they're starving but personally I love it. You any good at hunting?
If you can get me a few good cuts of %s I'll make it worth your while. Mmm... I'm drooling just thinking about it.
Yes! I'm going to eat good tonight! Thank you stalker, here is your payment. Oh, and here, I have some ammo that is the wrong caliber for my rifle, you can have it.
Rifle for a %s
A fellow stalker is offering a rifle in exchange for a %s artefact.
Are you any good at artefact hunting?
If you happen to find a %s, let me know. I can't afford to pay you but I have a very nice rifle I think you will like.
Finally! You don't know how long I've been searching for this. Here, this is my finest rifle. I hate to part with it but it is well worth it to me.
Replace Looted %s for a Stalker
A stalker needs a %s to replace the one that was stolen from him.
Yeah, my stash was looted and I lost my favorite rifle. Can you help me find a new one?
I'm looking for a %s. I loved that rifle. If you can find me one in good condition I'll pay you a premium for it.
Thank you stalker! Here is what I owe you. Now off to hunt that damn izlom...
Find a Reliable %s for Duty
Procure a reliable %s for a Duty member.
This rifle I was issued is shit. I need one that won't jam on me in every firefight. Can you find a new one for me?
Get me a %s. I'll make it worth your while.
Excellent! She's a beauty. Here, take this for your trouble.
Rescue Kidnapped Stalker
A stalker's buddy was kidnapped by a gang of bandits. He asked me to try and rescue him.
I could really use some help, man. My friend was mugged and taken hostage by some bandits. I really don't know what I should do. Do you think you can help me out and save my friend?
You did it! Thank you, stalker. It's good to see my friend back and alive! Here - for your trouble:
Free the Duty Hostage
I've been tasked to rescue a member of Duty who is being held hostage.
Stalker, our comrade was wounded and taken hostage! I'm in desperate need of someone capable enough to stage a rescue operation. Do you think you can help us out and save our friend?
Thank you, stalker. It's good to see you saved our fellow comrade! Here - for your trouble:
Hostage Rescue for Freedom
I've been tasked to rescue a member of Freedom who is being held hostage.
Yes, one of my comrades has been captured! Please rescue him!
You did it! Thank you, stalker. It's good to see my friend back and alive! Here - for your trouble:
Ecologist Ransom
Speak to Bandits and pay the ransom for the release of an Ecologist they are holding hostage.
Yes, please help! One of my colleagues was kidnapped by bandits. They are demanding to be paid a ransom. Please, take this to them and bring my colleage back.
Thank you, stalker. It's good to see my colleague back! Please accept this as a reward.
Reverse Bounty Hunt
A stalker needs a bounty taken off his head.
Yes, help me brother! Some bastard has put a price on my head. Take care of him for me and I will pay you double the bounty he has on me.
Oh, thank you stalker! Here is your payment. I can finally sleep for the first time in days!
Vengeance for Stalker
A stalker wants me to avenge the death of his comrade.

A bandit snuck into our camp last night and murdered my friend in cold blood. This kind of scum cannot be allowed to live. Kill him for me, stalker. In return I will give you my slain comrade's rifle.
Thank you stalker, you are a good warrior. Join me in a drink to my fallen brother.
Find %s for a Bandit
A Bandit has some loot he wants to trade if I can bring him %s.
You wanna to swap some loot?
I've got some good shit I can give you if you can get me some %s.
Great man, thanks!
Find %s for Military
Find %s for a soldier.
You have any supplies you want to trade?
Tell you what, I'll trade you some extra ammo I've got if you can get me some %s.
Great man, thanks!
Contraband %s
A soldier is offering a rifle in exchange for the %s artefact.
Hey, listen man. I know this is against regulations, but I'm going to be rotating home soon and I want to bring back a souvenir. You think you can find an artefact for me?
I want to get a %s. If you can find me one I'll give you my rifle.
Awesome! Here's what I promised you. Don't let the commander know I have this.
%s Straw Purchase
A bandit needs an untraceable %s, no questions asked.
Listen, I need a rifle that can't be traced back to me, you know what I mean? You willing to help me out with this?
I need a %s. Buy it, steal it, loot it, whatever you gotta do, just get me one. I'll pay you double what it's worth.
Great! Here's what I promised you. And you never met me, got it?
Assassination on a Dare
A fellow soldier has bet his rifle that I can't assassinate a high-value target.

What, are you trying to climb the ranks or something? Tell you what hotshot, I happen to know the location of a certain high-value target the brass wants eliminated. I'll bet you my rifle you can't even get close to him.

For real? You really did it? Damn, if I though you had any chance I never would have made this bet. Well, a deal's a deal. Here's my rifle. But you better be covering my ass with it in the next firefight.
Mercenary Subcontractor
You have taken over a contract killing for a Merc.
I do, actually. I've taken on a few too many jobs. You want to take over one of my contracts for me? I'll give you most of the bounty on it.
Great job. Here's the money I owe you.
Eliminate Enemy Forces
The enemy has been spotted in the area. Engage the infidels in battle for the good of the Monolith.
My brother, we have sighted the enemy in the area. We are going to alert our brothers to do battle. Go there now. Destroy them.
You have done well, my brother.
Scouting Expedition
Scout the area where enemy forces have been sighted. Engage any enemy encountered.
There are reports of enemy activity in the neighboring area and our squad is tasked with engaging them. I'm looking for someone who is willing to scout ahead in preparation for our assault.
Excellent! Well done.
Eliminate Dangerous Mutants for Duty
Eliminate dangerous mutants in the area for the Duty faction.
We can't have so much dangerous mutant activity in the area, someone's going to get killed. Head out there and thin out the herd a bit.
Well done, here's your reward.
Clear the Research Area
A local faction has been harassing a scientist. Clear them out of the area so he may conduct his research.

There is an area that I must conduct some important research on but there is a group of squatters who have moved in there and they shoot at me anytime I go near there. I must perform this research stalker. Can you convince them to move along?
Thank you stalker you have aided me immensely. Please take this as a token of my gratitude.
Bring %s to Monolith Member
One of your brothers is ill and requires %s.
I must be strong to serve the Monolith well but I confess my strength is weakening. Can you help me, brother?
My brother, I am very ill. Cleric has graciously offered to pray for me but I'm pretty sure I just need %s. Please bring me some.
Thank you my brother. May the glory of the Monolith shine upon you.
Search the Stash
A stalker has given the location of a good stash. If it contains a PDA, he is offering a reward.
I know where someone hid a good stash. If you find a PDA in there bring it to me, I'll pay you for it. Anything else you find is yours.
Thank you stalker!
Collect %s Tissue Sample
An Ecologist needs a tissue sample from a %s.
I'm researching certain mutants in the area. I need someone to collect a tissue sample for me.
If you could hunt one down for me, I need a sample of %s brought back to me. I can pay you for your trouble and, of course, the considerable risk involved.
Thank you, sir. This will help immensely in my research.
Drug Runner
A Freedomer needs his latest shipment delivered.
Hey man, I'm expecting a shipment of, ah, "medical supplies" and I need someone to pick it up. Want to make some extra cash?
Thanks man. Here's your cut.
Retrieve Documents for Clear Sky
A Clear Sky member needs his documents returned to him.
I have some important documents that I stashed away when I was attacked by mutants. I dread to go back there. If you can you get them for me, I'll gladly pay you.
Thank you stalker!
Push Back Monolith Incursion
Monolith fighters have been spotted near this location. Prevent them from encroaching on the area.
Hey man, I just spotted some Monolith not too far from here. I'm going to alert Lukash, keep an eye on them.
Good job man. Lukash was sending out some reinforcements, I guess we won't need them. He wanted me to give you this.
Interdict Enemy Forces
Intercept the enemy forces moving in on the area.
Bandits are moving in on the area. I'm going to alert the commander. Hold them off until I get back.
Outstanding! You are a fine soldier.
Redemption
A Monolith brother was defeated by an infidel. Destroy him lest anyone begin to think the Monolith are not to be feared.

My brother, Rabbit has asked of me that I slay one of the infidels for the good of the Monolith. I fear I have failed him, as I was not able to get to the target. Will you not complete my task and redeem my failure?
You have done well. It is an honor to serve the almighty Monolith along side with you.
Find %s for a Merc
I was asked to find %s, by a Mercenary.
Can you do me a huge favour? I'm running low on my supplies. Can you help me out?
I'm low on %s. Come find me if you get your hands on any.
Thanks!
%s Stew
A Bandit has a special recipe for preparing mutant meat and needs %s brought to him.
Man, you ever tried mutant meat? A lot of guys won't touch it unless they're starving but personally I love it. You any good at hunting?
If you can get me a few good cuts of %s I'll make it worth your while. Mmm... I'm drooling just thinking about it.
Yes! I'm going to eat good tonight! Thanks man, here is your payment and a little loot for ya.
Find a Reliable %s for Merc
Procure a reliable %s for a Mercenary.
This rifle I was issued is shit. I need one that won't jam on me in every firefight. Can you find a new one for me?
Get me a %s. I'll make it worth your while.
Excellent! She's a beauty. Here, take this for your trouble.
Find a Reliable %s for Military
Procure a reliable %s for Military.
This rifle I was issued is shit. I need one that won't jam on me in every firefight. Can you find a new one for me?
Get me a %s. I'll make it worth your while.
Excellent! She's a beauty. Here, take this for your trouble.
Bandit Subcontractor
You have taken over a contract killing for a Bandit.
I've taken on a few too many jobs. You want to take over one of my contracts for me? I'll give you most of the bounty on it.
Thanks. Here's the money I owe you.
Eliminate Dangerous Mutants for Clear Sky
Eliminate dangerous mutants in the area for Clear Sky.
I was just attacked by a pack of mutants. I'll show you where they are, take them out before they kill somebody.
Thank you, please take this as a reward.
Eliminate Dangerous Mutants for Monolith
Eliminate dangerous mutants in the area for the Monolith.
There are dangerous mutants in the area. They have killed one of our brothers. Go eliminate them.
You have done well, my brother.
Wh-Who are you? Are you here to help me, stalker?
Come with me if you want to live!
Special order: collect the goods
The goods have been delivered - time to collect them from Nimble.
Special order: wait for delivery
The order has been made, so now you should wait for Nimble to get the goods.
Attention! Emission imminent!
Emission imminent, proceed to shelter immediately!
You are not allowed to leave the shelter during an emission.
Emission: Find shelter
Emission: Stay sheltered
Attention!
Radioactive fallout begins.
The level of radiation is dangerous. You should hide from the radioactive fallout.
You shouldn't leave the shelter during the radioactive fallout.
Radioactive fallout: Find shelter
Radioactive fallout: Stay sheltered
Attention!
Radioactive fallout has ended
Attention!
Chemical fallout begins.
The level of contamination is dangerous. You should hide from the chemical fallout.
You shouldn't leave the shelter during the chemical fallout.
Chemical fallout: Find shelter
Chemical fallout: Stay sheltered
Attention!
Chemical fallout has ended
Attention!
Psi-storm begins.
You should hide from the psi-storm.
You shouldn't leave the shelter during the psi-storm.
Psi-storm: Find shelter
Psi-storm: Stay sheltered
Attention!
Psi-storm has ended
Turn off the Miracle Machine ($$ACTION_USE$$)
Defend the base against mutants
Defend the scientists' camp against zombified stalkers
Mutants are attacking the base, help to defend it.

Zombified stalkers are attacking the mobile lab, help to defend it. The weak blowout which just started doesn't affect you. Search for and use the deployable machine gun on the roof of the mobile lab.
